name: Druid Defence
description:
This is my contribute for Mini Jam 50.

Druid Defence is an alternative of the Tetris game, developed in solo.

Music is:

Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound) - Ofelia's Dream

Comands:

W - to rotate tetramino

A/D/S - to move tetramino

Right click when fireball is ready to destroy enemy.

Click on TetraSacriface Spell to eliminate tetramini when needed.
